headline: ‘Staying Selective’: Mizuho Picks 2 Quality Oil & Gas Stocks for Long-Term Returns
summary: The energy sector is notoriously sensitive. Everything from consumer demand to industrial demand to seasonal weather to changing political winds will impact the oil and gas markets, leaving investors with a difficult landscape to navigate. Offering guidance through this intricate landscape is Mizuho’s sector expert, Nitin Kumar, who has clear advice for investors. “Oil & Gas has the potential to rerate vs. the broader market, the low (~3.2%) weighting in the S&P 500 and narrow breadth of valuati
